duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a strategic plan to drive sales growth within Globant Commerce Studio.
Identify new business opportunities through market research and prospecting activities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers.
Develop and deliver sales presentations and proposals to potential clients.
Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation of client solutions.
Define/Refine the Go to market strategy for revenue growth of Globant Commerce Studio.
Lead solution definition and scoping to generate technical solutions, estimates, and project implementation approaches.
Define a solution for a customer by recommending relevant Commerce Solutions and broader ecosystem offerings.
Develop propositions for customers based on the PoV for the Industry, including writing proposals.
Present technical topics to senior, technical and business audiences and C-Levels.
Lead or co-lead answers to RFPs issued by clients.
Identifies product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.

Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; benchmarking state-of-the-art practices; and participating in professional societies.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent work experience.
More than 10 years of work experience in IT.
More than 7 years of experience with at least a few eCommerce platforms e.g. Salesforce Commerce Cloud, Commerce Tools, Adobe Commerce or similar.
Having relationships within the relevant platform partner ecosystem would be a huge plus.
At least 5 years of experience in selling and driving professional services business with large-scale US based organizations.
At least 5 years of progressive experience implementing and designing eCommerce solutions.
Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills.
Strong communication, negotiation, sales planning, prospecting skills, meeting sales goals and presentation skills.
